title: Ep. 122 - From Lukov With Love by Mariana Zapata (PART 2)
itunes:title: Ep. 122 - From Lukov With Love by Mariana Zapata (PART 2)
description:
Hey HBs! We're here with part 2 of From Lukov With Love by Mariana Zapata! This Slytherin/Slytherin romance was ALL ABOUT THE W and gave us all the feels! 
 Bonus content: RIGHT TO BOOK!, Erin eats a little crow but then takes it back, *Bing Boong Bong* This Is A Bullshit with Erin, Melody's gross depression life hack, all of Ivan's nurtures and doing compliments and SWOON, *Bing Boong Bong* Birth Control with Melody, one of the most graphically described sex scenes we've ever done?, and so much more! 
 Lady Loves: 
 Melody: International Delight Coffee Creamer in Oreo
 Erin: Fancy dog kennel that looks like a classy table! 
 Listener Elizabeth S talks all about nerdom and being a lifelong romance reader with dyslexia in this Smart Podcast, Trashy Books  episode. 
 Patreon Shout Out: 
 Ashley T, you are https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Beiwe (Beiwe), the Sami goddess of the sun, spring, fertility, and sanity. You fill every space you enter with your positivity and hope, like spring, you have the ability to renew drab outlooks and projects with your fresh perspective. Beiwe was also known to restore the mental health of those driven mad by the darkness of the winter, and you do that for yourself and your inner circle because you have an innate ability to separate yourself from toxic people. So, thanks for your warmth and grounded sense of healthy choices, Ashley. You make every day a beautiful dawning. 
 Make sure to check out our Patreon for 75 exclusive posts!
 Subscribe! Rate! Review! 
 Merch: Redbubble
 And follow our socials: 
 Instagram: @heavingbosoms
 Twitter: @heaving_bosoms
  Facebook

This box has EVERYTHING you could ever want in a book boyfriend from Tessa Bailey, Avery Flynn, Farrah Rochon, Jayci Lee, Kennedy Ryan, Adriana Herrera, and Naima Simone.
You can look forward to paperbacks, signed book plates, limited edition book boyfriend mugs, the book boyfriend pajamas/loungewear, bookmarks and more!

Hey HBs! We're here with part 2 of From Lukov With Love by Mariana Zapata! This Slytherin/Slytherin romance was ALL ABOUT THE W and gave us all the feels! 

Bonus content: RIGHT TO BOOK!, Erin eats a little crow but then takes it back, *Bing Boong Bong* This Is A Bullshit with Erin, Melody's gross depression life hack, all of Ivan's nurtures and doing compliments and SWOON, *Bing Boong Bong* Birth Control with Melody, one of the most graphically described sex scenes we've ever done?, and so much more! 

Lady Loves: 

Melody: International Delight Coffee Creamer in Oreo

Erin: Fancy dog kennel that looks like a classy table! 

Listener Elizabeth S talks all about nerdom and being a lifelong romance reader with dyslexia in this Smart Podcast, Trashy Books episode. 

Patreon Shout Out: 

Ashley T, you are Beiwe, the Sami goddess of the sun, spring, fertility, and sanity. You fill every space you enter with your positivity and hope, like spring, you have the ability to renew drab outlooks and projects with your fresh perspective. Beiwe was also known to restore the mental health of those driven mad by the darkness of the winter, and you do that for yourself and your inner circle because you have an innate ability to separate yourself from toxic people. So, thanks for your warmth and grounded sense of healthy choices, Ashley. You make every day a beautiful dawning.
